org.lafayette.server.domain

Interface RoleFinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoleMapper

    public interface RoleFinder
    Domain facade to obtain roles from persistent data storage.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Method Summary

      Deletes Role from database.

      Find role by it's id.

      • find

        Role find(int id)
        Find role by it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - id to find
        Returns:
        null if no role found

      • findByUserId

        Collection<Role> findByUserId(int userId)
        Find all roles belonging to an user id.
        Parameters:
        userId - of user to find roles for
        Returns:
        never null, but maybe empty collection

      • findByName

        Collection<Role> findByName(Role.Names loginName)
        Find all roles belonging to an user's login name.
        Parameters:
        loginName - of user to find roles for
        Returns:
        never null, but maybe empty collection

      • findAll

        Collection<Role> findAll(int limit,
                       int offset)
        Find all roles.
        Parameters:
        limit - maxim amount of roles
        offset - offset of roles
        Returns:
        never null, but maybe empty collection
